features: 👍【Muti-Functional Smart Watch for Kids】The 1.54'' upgrade kids watch with selfie-cam, 24 games, music, torch, voice recorder, pedometer, alarm, stopwatch, calculator, theme, screensaver select, backlight time, volume adjustment etc. Secure watches for kids bring convenience and fun to girls and boys in life, so it is great gift.

👍【HD Camera & Video】Kids touchscreen smart watch supports such as camera and video perfectly. 5-10 year olds can capture quality videos, pictures and record their happy daily life. Encourage children to discover beautiful things around! Customize your photo as wallpapers. This kids watch can store more than 10000+ HD photos or 6+ hours of video, which is best great gifts.

👍【24 Puzzle Games】Great birthday gift for kids age 5-12, with Newest 24 puzzle games, which can effectively exercise logical thinking and reaction skills, and improve hand-eye coordination while playing games. Include time teaching, which allows children to learn time. Develop good habits in children. Perfect toy for kids age 5 6 7 8 9 10.

👍【Alarm Clock/Pedometer】Kids can set time reminders to get their things done on time. Kid watch built-in pedometer, that can to track kids activity steps and calories burned. It encourages children to exercise actively, keep in good healthy.

👍【Great Gift for Kids】This watch for kids with full touch color screen, No SIM Card Required, don’t need to download app. Very easy to operate for kids. Intended for kids ages 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12 years, your boys & girls can begin to enjoy the kids smartwatch as soon as receiving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for 9-year old!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Wiszodet Smart Watch for my 9-year-old daughter, and it has exceeded all my expectations. This smartwatch is not only a great gadget but also a fantastic tool for learning and entertainment. The 1.54" touch screen is vibrant and easy for her to navigate, and the inclusion of an HD camera and video function has added a whole new level of excitement to her playtime.The 24 games and music features have kept her engaged for hours, and the pedometer has encouraged her to stay active and track her steps, promoting a healthy lifestyle. Additionally, the flashlight and alarm clock functions have proven to be incredibly useful in various situations, from nighttime adventures to waking up in the morning.The watch's durability has also impressed me, as it has survived daily wear and tear without any issues. I also appreciate the thoughtful design, which is both stylish and comfortable for my daughter to wear throughout the day.Moreover, this smartwatch has been a lifesaver during family outings and trips, keeping my daughter entertained and engaged. It has become an essential part of her daily routine, and she absolutely loves it.In conclusion, the Wiszodet Smart Watch is a fantastic gift for any child. It's educational, entertaining, and promotes an active lifestyle. I highly recommend it to any parent looking for a quality, fun, and functional smartwatch for their child. It has brought so much joy to my daughter and has become an indispensable part of her daily life. Kudos to Wiszodet for creating such a wonderful product!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for price
reviews.reviewText: This watch is great! Especially for the price. My 9 year old daughter loves it. Battery holds up extremely well and the camera has surprisingly good resolution. Putting music on it is difficult, still haven't quite figured that one out. But the rest is great. Cute little 'apps'. Definitely has a big face, but doesn't look awkward

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for kids
reviews.reviewText: Battery life not so great but kids love the watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's an amazing smart watch for your kids under the age of 12. Has games, torch, camera, alarm and what not. My son loves it and he uses it mostly when he is in the car and bored.It can be a great gift and the price is so reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Grandson loved it has lots of different featuresGrandson reviewThat’s fun to use it works. It’s just kind of bad whenever it’s on military time. Overall it’s 8/10:)Dad fix time yay 😃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It said 8-12 but has two year old games on it
reviews.reviewText: This product said 8-12 and has two year old baby games on it . I gave it a three start bc the watch works as expected and it was easy to set

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Wanted to get my 8-year-old son a “smart” watch since he really likes my Apple Watch. While the features aren’t outstanding. It offers a camera that he has loads of fun with and quite a few games. Best of all, it functions as a watch. So far it’s been good. Charge last all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after a Day
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves the watch. Just disappointed it stopped working. So it worked when given for Christmas 2023, then a day later it was unable to charge. Have no clue what to do. The battery can not be replaced.Any suggestions?
